data.name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shou Epilogue
data.detailed_description:
Note: This is the epilogue to Shou's Main Story. You should have already completed at least the Mystic Ending before playing this.

It's been five months since the incidents at Caro mansion. Your relationship with Shou is going well and you even bring him along to meet your family. But there are still some things you feel Shou is keeping from you about his new life. An incident ends up bringing the two of you closer, but it may also serve as a dark omen for the future...

Features

  • Three new chapters
  • New characters/sprites
  • A new outfit for Shou
  • A new CG
  • A new achievement

How to Play

After purchasing the DLC, please go to Select a Story > Click on Shou > Click on Epilogue in the top navigation menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or better
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Sound Card: Any

data.legal_notice:
• Gameplay videos need to have prior permission to be uploaded outside of Steam. Doing so without permission means your video might be at risk to be taken down. Email us at support@starmaidengames.com to request prior permission.
  • Screenshots are welcomed and encouraged, but please avoid showing any major plot moments.
